_description: A definition of Chastity — four lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
A tresour of gret RichesseA virtue of douthtynesseAnd is a
                    worsshipful CloþingAnd an help of gret Wynning
BLHar7322.Attributed Title: Castitas est (f. 149, to the left of the stanza)

Furnivall,  Frederick James,
